name: svg-path-utils
description: Some utils for SVG's path data like path data generation, inverse path data calculation, ...

scripts.build: mkdir -p build && VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'` && rollup -f umd --banner "/* svg-path-utils, v${VERSION} */" -n svg_path_utils -o build/svg-path-utils.js -- index.js && npm run uglify

author: Tin Skipor
